EmailTemplate.subject: Will you join us this Wednesday?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Seeing as you'veÂ registered for our webinars in the past, I wanted to make sure you didn't miss this next one coming up on Wednesday morning at 11am EST.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/continuous-aws-ri-consumption]]>
During this live demo, Director of Technical Marketing and Technology Evangelist, Eric Wright will take you through a live tour of the new cloud features of Turbonomic 6.1, with a focus on our continuous AWS Reserved Instance (RI) utilization.
I hope you can join us <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/continuous-aws-ri-consumption]]>!
Best, Elizabeth
